title: Safe GH Configuration
description: Configuration file for safe-gh. Rules are evaluated in order; first matching rule applies.

allowedOwners.description: Global restriction: only allow operations on repos owned by these users/organizations.

issueSubIssue.description: Rules for issue sub-issue operations (add/remove sub-issues).

issueDependency.description: Rules for issue dependency operations (add/remove blocked-by relationships).

selfUserId.description: GitHub login name for "createdBy": "self" / "assignee": "self" conditions. Get with: gh api user --jq .login

defaultPermission.description: Default behavior when no rule matches. Only "deny" is supported.

owners.description: Restrict to repositories owned by these users/organizations.

titlePrefix.description: Match only issues whose title starts with this prefix.

parentIssue.description: Conditions for the parent issue. Match only issues whose parent issue satisfies these conditions.

number.description: Match only issues that are sub-issues of this parent issue number.

assignee.description: Match only issues whose parent issue is assigned to self.

titlePrefix.description: Match only issues whose parent issue title starts with this prefix.

addLabels.description: Labels to add when the rule matches.

removeLabels.description: Labels to remove when the rule matches.

addAssignees.description: Assignees to add when the rule matches. Use "self" for the configured selfUserId.

removeAssignees.description: Assignees to remove when the rule matches. Use "self" for the configured selfUserId.

titlePrefix.description: Prefix to prepend to the issue title on create. Skipped if the title already starts with this prefix.
